page.title: 03EAST KILBRIDE AND THE CHURCH
page.content: EAST KILBRIDE AND THE CHURCH. The local church provides many activities for the community.These include the SUNDAY SCHOOL and CHOIR. "At 12 o'clock Mrs Shanks raises her hands for quietness and we raise ours to show that we are listening.Our first hymn is"Lord Jesus,be Thou with us now" Mrs Shanks goes on to read a story from the BIBLE and later we go into groups to answer questions and colour the pictures in our Sunday School book.At the end,one member makes up a prayer and says it aloud.We say good_bye at 1pm and go home" The Choir takes place on Friday nights and we practice songs for the operetta "Princess in Poppyland" The actual performance occurs in April and we dress up in costumes and wear make-up. Our parents come to see us on stage.
